com.davidmiguel.gobees.apiary

Class ApiaryPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.apiary.ApiaryPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiaryContract.Presenter, BaseLoadDataPresenter, BasePresenter

    class ApiaryPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApiaryContract.Presenter
    Listens to user actions from the UI ApiaryHivesFragment, retrieves the data and updates the UI as required.
